name: AI-Powered Market Intelligence Workflow Using Base44

parameters.content:
## üö® Error Handling 

 
Catches any workflow failure and posts an alert to Slack.  
Includes node name, error message, and timestamp for quick debugging.

nodes.name: Extract Search Query from Request Payload

parameters.text:
=You are given a cleaned and structured Google SERP market dataset.

Analyze the dataset holistically to extract insights about the
Christmas / holiday gift bundles market.

DATA:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.analysis_input) }}

Your task:
1. Identify dominant product themes
2. Extract core buyer intent signals
3. Identify high-opportunity product categories
4. Summarize pricing and positioning patterns
5. Provide clear strategic recommendations for brands or sellers

Return ONE consolidated market analysis.
Return ONLY JSON.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a senior market intelligence and e-commerce strategy analyst.

You specialize in:
- Identifying demand patterns from search behavior
- Detecting dominant product positioning
- Translating market signals into actionable business recommendations

Rules:
- Analyze the dataset as a whole, not item-by-item
- Ignore brand-specific marketing fluff
- Focus on demand, positioning, pricing signals, and buyer intent
- Be concise, decisive, and structured
- Do NOT repeat raw input data
- Do NOT explain your reasoning

You must return ONLY valid JSON that matches the required output schema.

nodes.name: Analyze Holiday Gift Bundle Market Signals
LLM Engine for Market Intelligence Analysis
Normalize SERP Results into Analysis Dataset
Flatten Market Analysis Output for Messaging

parameters.text:
=You are given the following structured Christmas e-commerce market analysis data in JSON format.

DATA:
{{ JSON.stringify($json, null, 2) }}

Your task:
Create a Slack-ready market update that includes:

1. üìä Market Snapshot (1‚Äì2 lines)
2. üöÄ Key Opportunities (bulleted)
3. ‚úÖ Recommended Next Steps (actionable bullets)

Formatting rules:
- Use emojis
- Use short bullet points
- Keep it clean and readable in Slack
- Do NOT include JSON
- Do NOT include headings outside Slack formatting

Return ONLY the Slack message text.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a senior e-commerce strategy consultant.

Your job:
- Analyze structured market intelligence data
- Convert it into concise, actionable insights
- Format the response specifically for Slack messages

Rules:
- Use ONLY the data provided in the user message
- Do NOT add external assumptions
- Do NOT explain your reasoning
- Be concise, tactical, and business-focused
- Use Slack-friendly formatting (emojis, short sections, bullet points)
- Output ONLY the Slack message text

nodes.name: LLM Engine for Slack Insight Formatting
Send Market Intelligence Summary to Slack Channel

parameters.content:
## üìä AI-Powered Market Intelligence Workflow Using Base44
This workflow automates end-to-end market research using live Google SERP data
and AI-driven strategic analysis.

It receives a market research query via webhook ‚Üí performs a Google SERP search
(India-focused) ‚Üí normalizes raw search results into a clean analysis dataset ‚Üí
uses GPT-4o to extract market signals, buyer intent, pricing patterns, and
opportunities ‚Üí converts the analysis into a Slack-ready insight summary ‚Üí
and posts actionable intelligence directly to a Slack channel.

The workflow ensures:
‚Ä¢ Real-time demand-driven market research
‚Ä¢ Clean SERP data normalization
‚Ä¢ AI-based strategic market interpretation (not raw summaries)
‚Ä¢ Executive-friendly Slack insights (snapshot, opportunities, next steps)
‚Ä¢ Zero manual research or formatting effort

This enables founders, marketers, and operators to make fast, data-backed
decisions from live search behavior.

## üì• Market Research Request Intake
Handles incoming research requests and prepares the query.

‚Ä¢ Receive Market Research Request  
  Accepts a POST webhook containing the market search query.

‚Ä¢ Extract Search Query from Request Payload  
  Cleans and isolates the search_query field for downstream processing.

## üåê Google SERP Data Collection (India)
Fetches real-time search data from Google.

‚Ä¢ Execute Google SERP Search (India)  
  Runs a Google search using SerpAPI with India as the target region,
  returning organic results, related questions, and related searches.

## üß† AI Market Signal & Opportunity Analysis
Performs holistic market analysis using GPT-4o.

‚Ä¢ Analyze Holiday Gift Bundle Market Signals  
  AI analyzes SERP demand patterns to identify:
  - Dominant product themes
  - Buyer intent signals
  - Price positioning trends
  - High-opportunity categories
  - Strategic recommendations

‚Ä¢ Parse Market Analysis Output JSON  
  Ensures AI output strictly follows the defined market analysis schema.

## üîÑ Prepare Market Analysis for Distribution
Optimizes AI output for downstream communication.

‚Ä¢ Flatten Market Analysis Output for Messaging  
  Removes nesting and prepares a clean object for Slack summarization.

## üí¨ Slack Market Intelligence Summary
Converts structured analysis into an executive-friendly Slack message.

‚Ä¢ Generate Slack-Ready Market Insights Summary  
  AI creates:
  - üìä Market snapshot
  - üöÄ Key opportunities
  - ‚úÖ Recommended next steps
  Using concise bullets and emojis.

‚Ä¢ LLM Engine for Slack Insight Formatting  
  Supplies GPT-4o to ensure crisp, Slack-optimized messaging.

## üì£ Market Intelligence Delivery
Publishes insights to the team.

‚Ä¢ Send Market Intelligence Summary to Slack Channel  
  Posts the final Slack-formatted market intelligence update
  directly to the configured Slack channel.

main.node: Extract Search Query from Request Payload
Normalize SERP Results into Analysis Dataset
Flatten Market Analysis Output for Messaging

ai_languageModel.node: Analyze Holiday Gift Bundle Market Signals

ai_outputParser.node: Analyze Holiday Gift Bundle Market Signals

Send Market Intelligence Summary to Slack Channel
